title: Amazon Store Key Metrics Hourly Daily Report
description: Hourly daily report presenting key metrics for an Amazon store

Time.description: Time of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY HH:mm'

Selected_date_range_Ordered_product_sale.description: Ordered product sales amount for the selected date range

Selected_date_range_Units_ordered.description: Total number of units ordered for the selected date range

Same_date_range_one_year_ago_Ordered_pro.description: Ordered product sales amount for the same date range one year ago

Same_date_range_one_year_ago_Units_order.description: Total number of units ordered for the same date range one year ago
